patterns: My bank activity notification does not work
Why don't I receive my bank activity notification
My account notification system is broken.
How can I get account notification.
responses: First you need to have a bank account and register your bank account to receive the notification.

patterns: How do I open a bank account?
I need to open a bank account.
What is the procedure of opening a bank account.
can I open a bank account online?
How do I make a new account
Can you help me make a new account
What do i need to do to make a new account
Steps to make a new account
What steps should I take to make a new account?
responses: You can open bank account online as well as in person from our different branches all over Nepal. All you need is a proof of identification(citizenship or passport) and 3 passport sized photo. We will be looking forward to welcome you into our family :).

patterns: Where can I find your branches?
Are there branches in where I live?
How many branches are there in Nepal?
responses: There are 15 branches all over Nepal in all the major cities like Kathmandu, Chitwan, Bhairahawa, Dharan etc. Why dont you see our website to see which location suits you the best at www.bank.com?

patterns: What sort of interest do you provide?
How much interest do you give on a savings account?
What is the annual interest rate?
Do you know about the interest rates?
responses: We provide an interest of 6% on savings account and 10% on fixed deposit. The interest rates can change according to the market.

patterns: How do i get the banking App
Where to get the banking Application
How do i download the Banking Apllication
How do i get the banking application
responses: You may download the application from the playstore at googleplay.dummy.bank

patterns: How do I make a new ATM card?
How to make an atm card
Need to make an ATM card
What should I do to get a new ATM card
do you know how to get a new ATM card?
responses: To make a new ATM card, you can fill out the form at www.bankFormAtm.com, we will send you an email once it is ready to pick up

patterns: How do I make a new chequebook?
Need to make a cheque book
What should I do to get a new cheque book
what is a price to make a cheque book
responses: To make a new cheque book, you can fill out the form at www.bankFormcheque.com, the site will send you an email once it's ready to pick up,it costs 100 nrs to make a new one
